Enabling GIT support (beta)Â¶

Git support in RhodeCode 1.1 was disabled due to current instability issues. However,if you would like to test git support please feel free to re-enable it. To re-enable GIT support just uncomment the git line in the file rhodecode/__init__.py

BACKENDS = {
    'hg': 'Mercurial repository',
    #'git': 'Git repository',
}

Note

Please note that the git support provided by RhodeCode is not yet fully stable and RhodeCode might crash while using git repositories. (That is why it is currently disabled.) Thus be careful about enabling git support, and certainly don’t use it in a production setting!

Support my development effort.
